transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source2 derive(movie = toInteger(byName('movie')),
		title = toString(byName('title')),
		genres = toString(byName('genres')),
		year = toInteger(byName('year')),
		Rating = toInteger(byName('Rating')),
		{Rotton Tomato} = toInteger(byName('Rotton Tomato'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
